data.lyric:
[ti:Feel Me]
[ar:セレーナ・ゴメス]
[al:Feel Me - Single]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Feel Me - Selena Gomez (赛琳娜·戈麦斯)
[00:00.69]Lyrics by：Kurtis McKenzie/Selena Gomez/Lisa Scinta/Phil Shaouy/Ammar Malik/Ross Golan/Jacob Kasher Hindlin/Jon Mills
[00:01.39]Composed by：Kurtis McKenzie/Selena Gomez/Lisa Scinta/Phil Shaouy/Ammar Malik/Ross Golan/Jacob Kasher Hindlin/Jon Mills
[00:02.08]No one love you like I love ya
[00:04.32]Never cheat never lie
[00:06.77]Never put no one above ya
[00:08.87]I gave you space and time
[00:11.57]And now you're telling me you miss it
[00:14.02]And I'm still on your mind
[00:16.50]We were one in a million
[00:18.46]And love is hard to find
[00:22.17]Do you stay up late just so you don't dream
[00:31.75]Every time your lips touch another
[00:35.86]I want you to feel me
[00:38.28]I want you to feel me
[00:41.25]Every time you dance with somebody
[00:45.33]I want you to feel me
[00:47.90]I want you to feel me
[00:50.29]Do your days get a little bit longer
[00:53.73]Nights get a little bit colder
[00:56.00]Heartbeat a little bit louder
[00:58.98]Hah ah ah ah oh
[01:00.89]Days get a little bit longer
[01:03.36]Nights get a little bit colder
[01:05.64]Heartbeat a little bit louder
[01:08.68]Hah ah ah ah oh
[01:11.70]When you're running who you run to
[01:14.16]Where do you go to hide
[01:16.41]When she ain't giving you enough to get you through the night
[01:21.38]Won't be caught up in the middle
[01:23.70]Through your highs and your lows
[01:26.03]Baby long as you're not with me you'll always be alone
[01:31.80]Do you stay up late just so you don't dream
[01:41.29]Every time your lips touch another
[01:45.47]I want you to feel me
[01:47.87]I want you to feel me
[01:50.86]Every time you dance with somebody
[01:55.02]I want you to feel me
[01:57.48]I want you to feel me
[01:59.94]Do your days get a little bit longer
[02:03.37]Nights get a little bit colder
[02:05.54]Heartbeat a little bit louder
[02:08.71]Hah ah ah ah oh

[02:12.86]Nights get a little bit colder
[02:15.25]Heartbeat a little bit louder

[02:24.60]Feel me feel me
[02:29.46]Feel me feel me

[02:45.48]I want you to feel me

data.trans:
[ti:Feel Me]
[ar:セレーナ・ゴメス]
[al:Feel Me - Single]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.69]//
[00:01.38]//
[00:02.08]无人像我这般深爱你
[00:04.32]真心不变 始终如一
[00:06.77]在我心里没有人重要过你
[00:08.87]我会给你自由空间 不会将你禁锢
[00:11.57]如今你告诉我 你想念我
[00:14.02]我依然让你念念不忘
[00:16.50]我们都可谓是百里挑一
[00:18.46]我们之间的爱百年不遇
[00:22.17]你是否还熬夜晚睡只为不梦到我
[00:31.75]每次你的双唇亲吻她人时
[00:35.86]我只想你能感受我
[00:38.28]我只想你能感受我
[00:41.25]每次你与别人相邀共舞时
[00:45.33]我只想你能感受我
[00:47.90]我只想你能感受我
[00:50.29]你的白昼是否更加漫长难熬
[00:53.73]夜晚也变得寒冷无比
[00:56.00]心跳声愈演愈烈
[00:58.98]//
[01:00.89]白昼更加漫长难熬
[01:03.36]夜晚也变得寒冷无比
[01:05.64]心跳声愈演愈烈
[01:08.68]//
[01:11.70]当你逃避你本该投向的怀抱
[01:14.16]那时的你会藏匿何处
[01:16.41]当她无法伴你熬过这漫长黑夜
[01:21.38]难道你仍选择要困在其中
[01:23.70]经历了人生的起起落落
[01:26.03]宝贝 没有我的你总是那么孤独无助
[01:31.80]你是否还熬夜晚睡只为不梦到我
[01:41.29]每次你的双唇亲吻她人时
[01:45.47]我只想你能感受我
[01:47.87]我只想你能感受我
[01:50.86]每次你与别人相邀共舞时
[01:55.02]我只想你能感受我
[01:57.48]我只想你能感受我
[01:59.94]你的白昼是否更加漫长难熬
[02:03.37]夜晚也变得寒冷无比
[02:05.54]心跳声愈演愈烈
[02:08.71]//
[02:10.42]白昼更加漫长难熬
[02:12.86]夜晚也变得寒冷无比
[02:15.25]心跳声愈演愈烈
[02:18.28]//
[02:19.88]感受我 感受我
[02:24.60]感受我 感受我
[02:29.46]感受我 感受我
[02:38.95]每次你的双唇亲吻她人时
[02:43.12]我只想你能感受我
